alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Runnels and northwestern Concho Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lowake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paint Rock, Lowake, Us-83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
